message.name: ERR_FV_APPEALDECISIONDATE
message.locale: Appeal decision date must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_FV_APPEALRECEIPTDATE
message.locale: A receipt date must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_FV_RECEIPTMETHOD
message.locale: A method of receipt must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_FV_ISSUERECEIVEDDATE_EARLIER_THAN_APPEALSTARTDATE
message.locale: The Date Received must not be earlier than the Start Date of the Appeal Case.

message.name: ERR_FV_ISSUERECEIVEDDATE_FUTURE
message.locale: The Date Received must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_FV_RESOLUTIONAPPROVALDATE_AFTER_APPEALSTARTDATE
message.locale: The Resolution Approval Date must not be later than the Start Date of the Appeal Case.

message.name: ERR_FV_APPEALCASE_CANCELLED
message.locale: The Appeal Case is canceled. The Issue cannot be modified.
The Appeal Case is cancelled. The Issue cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_FV_APPEALCASEDECISION_NOTDECIDED
message.locale: Cannot modify as a resolution has been specified for the Appealed Issue.

message.name: ERR_FV_APPEALCASE_CANCELLED_ISSUE_CANNOT_BE_REMOVED
message.locale: The Appeal case is canceled. The Issue cannot be removed from the Appeal Case.
The Appeal case is cancelled. The Issue cannot be removed from the Appeal Case.

message.name: ERR_FV_APPEALEDISSUE_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: The Appealed Issue must not already be canceled.
The Appealed Issue must not already be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_FV_ATLEAST_ONE_APPEALEDISSUE_CANNOT_CANCEL_APPEALCASE
message.locale: Cannot delete as there must always be at least one Appealed Issue for an Appeal.

message.name: ERR_FV_APPEALCASEDECISION_NOTDECIDED_CANNOT_CANCEL
message.locale: A Decision exists for the Issue. The Issue cannot be removed from the Appeal Case.
